Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Based on the similar behaviour of CSSEP and NMP , it was concluded that the pharmacological process underlying this phenomenon was localised in the periphery .

The "Chemical" entities in the paragraph are:

1. CSSEP (which stands for "corticostriatal synaptic plasticity-enhancing polypeptide")
2. NMP (which stands for "N-methyl-D-aspartate")

Both CSSEP and NMP are chemical compounds, specifically peptides or neurotransmitters, that are involved in the pharmacological process mentioned in the paragraph.
